# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Medical Doctor
The Medical Doctor is responsible for providing medical support to the crew. They can achieve this by using medical tools and equipment. Doctors typically work in the Medbay, but can also respond to emergencies on scene if needed.
## Do - Use medical tools and equipment. - Respond to emergencies on scene. - Stay stocked with medicines, equipment and other supplies.
## Don't - Ignore crew members in need of medical attention.
